mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ct(cno, tno, term, capacity) VALUES(#{ct.cno}, #{ct.tno}, #{ct.term}, #{ct.capacity})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ct WHERE cno = #{ct.cno} AND tno = #{ct.tno} AND term = #{ct.term}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ct,course,teacher WHERE ct.tno = #{tno} AND ct.cno = course.cno AND ct.tno = teacher.tno
